alert.note: Alert for Cass; Northern Berrien; Southern Berrien; St. Joseph (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 18 at 3:22AM EST until November 18 at 7:00PM EST by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total additional snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Cass MI, St. Joseph MI, Northern Berrien and Southern Berrien Counties. * WHEN...Until 7 PM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult due to slick roads. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Lake effect snow this morning will result in areas of reduced visibility and treacherous travel conditions. Later today, snow will begin to diminish. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Slow down and use caution while traveling. &&

area.areaDesc: Cass; Northern Berrien; Southern Berrien; St. Joseph
